name: JHUL
description: A decorative cloth draped over an elephant's back, often used in ceremonies and festivals. Made from materials like silk or velvet, jhuls feature embroidery and embellishments, with designs reflecting cultural traditions.

types.name: No JHUL
types.description: No decorative cloth or border on the elephant.

types.name: Half JHUL
types.description: Partial cloth with a border at the end of the elephant's stomach.

types.name: Full JHUL
types.description: Full cloth with a border, completely covering the elephant's back.
